abstract: The Young Turks who made their mark as early backers of Facebook have raised a second investment round more than four times as large as their first, a move that seems to signal their growing clout as an alternative to venture capitalists on Silicon Valley’s Sand Hill Road.
lead_paragraph: The Young Turks who made their mark as early backers of Facebook have raised a second investment round more than four times as large as their first, a move that seems to signal their growing clout as an alternative to venture capitalists on Silicon Valley’s Sand Hill Road.

headline.main: Founders Fund Continues Shake-Up of Silicon Valley
